mapper.sql: BOX_INFO_ID as boxInfoId, BOX_NAME as boxName, BOX_CODE as boxCode, BOX_UNIQUE_CODE as boxUniqueCode, BOX_GROUP_ID as boxGroupId, SEC_KEY as secKey, STATUS as status, EXPRESS_STATUS as expressStatus, MOBILE_PHONE as mobilePhone, PROXY_CUSTOMER_INFO_ID as proxyCustomerInfoId, LONGITUDE as longitude, LATITUDE as latitude, OPENTIME as opentime, CHECKNUM as checknum, CREATETIME as createtime, ACTIVETIME as activetime, REPAIRTIME as repairtime, DEMISETIME as demisetime
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from t_box_info
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into t_box_info (BOX_NAME, BOX_CODE, BOX_UNIQUE_CODE, BOX_GROUP_ID, SEC_KEY, STATUS, EXPRESS_STATUS, MOBILE_PHONE, PROXY_CUSTOMER_INFO_ID, LONGITUDE, LATITUDE, OPENTIME, CHECKNUM, CREATETIME, ACTIVETIME, REPAIRTIME, DEMISETIME) values (#{boxName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{boxCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{boxUniqueCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{boxGroupId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{secKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expressStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobilePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{proxyCustomerInfoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{longitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{latitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opentime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{checknum,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{activetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{repairtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{demisetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
